name: Nature s Secrets Nourishing Carrot Lotion
description: Formulated with antioxidant-rich carrot extract and vitamin A which promotes healthy, vibrant skin, this soft textured, non-greasy body lotion absorbs instantly, intensely nourish and care your skin. Further enriched with rich, moisturising cocoa butter, tamarind seed extract and natural oils, it leaves skin deeply hydrated, smooth and irresistibly soft. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
